summary: Timeline_18 documents managing panic disorder and agoraphobia with professional help.

posts.text: My anxiety has been through the roof. I'm worthless and pathetic I had a panic attack at work yesterday. I'm losing my mind But I've been practicing the breathing exercises took my medication as prescribed and it's starting to help. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I'm going to get fired, I know it. I'm broken beyond repair My performance has been terrible. I don't care about anything anymore Met with HR about accommodations. took my medication as prescribed They're being supportive. Small steps are still progress
maladaptive_evidence: I don't care about anything anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I feel so alone. I have no reason to keep going Nobody understands what I'm going through. I isolated myself from all my friends Decided to join a support group. asked for support Met some people who actually get it. I'm worth the effort
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
I isolated myself from all my friends
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I'm broken beyond repair I feel like I'm ruining everything. I can't get out of bed anymore We decided to try couples therapy. started going to therapy Had our first session and it went better than expected. I'm worth the effort
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. I want to give up on everything I gave up trying Using the distraction techniques I learned. practiced my coping strategies Reached out to my crisis support instead. Things can get better
maladaptive_evidence: I want to give up on everything
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Work is overwhelming me. Everyone would be better off without me I'm on the verge of a breakdown. I've been drinking to cope Talked to my manager about reducing my workload. started going to therapy Taking a mental health day tomorrow. Recovery is a journey, not a destination
adaptive_evidence: Recovery is a journey, not a destination
maladaptive_evidence: Everyone would be better off without me
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: Thought I was getting better but I'm not. I have no reason to keep going Back to square one. I stopped taking my medication Reminded myself that recovery isn't linear. wrote in my journal Reaching out for support instead of giving up. I'm learning healthier coping skills
maladaptive_evidence: I have no reason to keep going
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. I deserve to suffer I can't get out of bed anymore But yesterday I finally started going to therapy and scheduled an appointment. I'm proud of myself for trying
adaptive_evidence: I'm proud of myself for trying
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I relapsed again last night. I'm disgusting I hate myself for it. I'm spiraling out of control Called my therapist this morning took my medication as prescribed and we talked through it. Taking it one day at a time
adaptive_evidence: Taking it one day at a time
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: The urges to self-harm are strong. I deserve to suffer I haven't showered in a week Using the distraction techniques I learned. set healthy boundaries Reached out to my crisis support instead. I acknowledge my progress
maladaptive_evidence: I haven't showered in a week
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: My partner and I have been fighting constantly. I hate myself so much I feel like I'm ruining everything. I pushed everyone away We decided to try couples therapy. joined a support group Had our first session and it went better than expected. I'm committed to my recovery
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping

posts.text: I've been struggling with depression for weeks now. I feel completely hopeless I can't get out of bed anymore But yesterday I finally set healthy boundaries and scheduled an appointment. I'm committed to my recovery
maladaptive_evidence: I can't get out of bed anymore
posts.summary: Post shows mixed emotional state with both struggles and coping
